alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 07 at 7:45PM MDT until May 08 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT SUNDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands, Northwest Highlands and Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...From Noon to 9 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. Areas of blowing dust may reduce visibilities to less than 3 miles at times.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau
